CREATE PROCEDURE proc_jtb_object_privilege_refresh_by_owner(creator BIGINT) BEGIN DELETE FROM jtb_object_privilege WHERE prv_object_from = creator;
INSERT INTO jtb_object_privilege (prv_object_from, prv_object_to, operation_type) SELECT DISTINCT * FROM ( SELECT pp.prv_owner, pp.prv_object, pp.operation_type FROM prv_privilege pp WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM prv_user uu WHERE uu.id = creator) UNION ALL SELECT pur.prv_user, pp.prv_object, pp.operation_type FROM prv_privilege pp INNER JOIN prv_user_role pur ON pur.prv_role = pp.prv_owner WHERE EXISTS(SELECT * FROM prv_role pr WHERE pr.id = creator)) AS sub; END;

CREATE PROCEDURE proc_jtb_object_hierarchy_delete(parent BIGINT, child BIGINT) BEGIN DELETE FROM jtb_object_hierarchy WHERE prv_object_to IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT prv_object_to AS id FROM jtb_object_hierarchy hj WHERE hj.prv_object_from = 5 UNION (SELECT 5)) AS sub) AND prv_object_from IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT prv_object_from AS id FROM jtb_object_hierarchy hj WHERE hj.prv_object_to = 7 UNION (SELECT 7)) AS sub); END;
